author: mininiva
title: NFTSwap ~ making NFTs fungible
description: Everyone sees NFTs as an asset class to be bought with crypto. We see them as a tradable asset just like Pokemon cards.
solution:
Provide a platform where users can trade their NFTs with other users' NFTs. 
We provide a recommendation engine and matching mechanism
experience:
I am head of Growth and Special projects for nate.tech.
I have built startups at Entrepreneur First, Founders Factory  and Public.io
